sentences.sContent: The centripetal and centrifugal forces acting in opposition to each other keep our planet in her orbit.
sentences.sContent_eng: The centripetal and centrifugal forces acting in opposition to each other keep our planet in her orbit.
sentences.sCn: 向心力和离心力互相对峙的缘故，遂能使行星在轨道上行动。

remMethod.val: centri(中心) + pet(追求) + al → 追求中心 → 向心的

trans.tranOther: acting, moving, or tending to move towards a centre
